Portfolio About

About

My name is Alexey

I`m a specialist who creates and maintains websites and applications. I can work both on the external the view of the site, and over it`s internal, server part. Testing and searching for bugs is also one of the tasks I undertake.

Web development
The process of creating a website. The main stages of the process are web design, layout pages, client-side and server-side programming, as well as web server configuration.
Website adaptation for mobile devices
These are technical measures to modernize the Internet resource for its equally convenient visual perception visitors from desktop and mobile devices, which usually have different screen resolutions.
Design
Designing any user interfaces in which usability is as important as appearance.

Skills

What I use in my work

HTML5
It is he who creates the framework of your website or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized the structure of your product
CSS3
This style language allows me to create absolutely any appearance of your website or application. Everything is limited only your imagination!
JS
This programming language allows you to animate anything: sliders, windows, hints, tabs, receiving data from the server and much more
BOOTSTRAP
This is a framework that is used by web developers for fast layout of responsive website designs and web applications.
PHP
It is a common general-purpose programming language. With it, the user can send you emails from the site.
SASS
It is a CSS-based metalanguage designed to increase the abstraction level of CSS code and simplify cascading files. style sheets. It is with the help of him that I will not keep you waiting for your project for a long time
GIT
Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.
AVOCODE
This is a graphic editor that allows the layout designer to get the code of elements directly from the layout. With it, I will be able to make a website according to the designer's template with pixel accuracy.
